unverify.title: 取消認證並重設
unverify.description: 這麼做將會開放並要求用戶重新認證。

punish.title: Punish ({action})
punish.description: This will punish the user with the set failed action.

verify.title: 認證
verify.description: 這麼做將會強制認證此用戶並給予已認證身分組。

manual_verification_warning: This user is blocked from verifying in the future, they will have to be verified manually by server staff.
